QuestData.Title: Laying Dionor to Rest
QuestData.Description: You have given me a tremendous gift with this bloom. I can finally send Dionor back to the Overgrowth for good and end this nightmare. All that remains is the ritual... stay and behold something you will never see again in your lifetime...
QuestData.RewardText: At last it is done. Dionor has left and his spawn shall follow him in due time.$b$bI grow weary of this conflict and the desire to return to the Overgrowth has left me.$b$bPerhaps I will travel beyond these lands and see what other surprises you little beasts have to share...
